com.habitsoft.kiyaa.views
Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
GeneratedHTMLView, ModelView<T>, ValueView
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseCollectionView, ButtonView, CssTableView, CustomComboBox, DockPanel, DynamicView, FrameView, ListView, LoadView, NoWaitView, TableView, TwoColumnForm, TwoRowForm, VerticalForm, WhenView, WidgetWrapperView, WithView
public interface View

A user interface component that can load and save its state on demand.

Method Summary
 void clearFields()
          Set all field to defaults (NOT the values in the model object)
 com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget getViewWidget()
          Get the visual representation of the "form".
 void load(com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
          Reset form fields to the last saved values in the model
 void save(com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<Void> callback)
          Tell the form to save the current inputs to its model and the database.
